snippet: After several missteps this year, news organizations have fine-tuned their safeguards and tried to prepare for a huge influx of social media reaction.
abstract: Major news networks and other news organizations, after several gaffes in 2012, are gearing up for election night, fine-tuning their safeguards and trying to prepare for huge influx of social media reaction; say they will get their state-by-state projections right, knowing it is chance to regain some credibility.
lead_paragraph: After several missteps this year, news organizations have fine-tuned their safeguards and tried to prepare for a huge influx of social media reaction.

headline.seo: A Media Vow of Election Night Restraint Despite Social Media Clamor
